entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
